colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(YE SHES KHYUNG KHRA'I SGRUB THABS, STENG 'OG GI NAD KYI GDUNG BA SEL BA'I ZLA SHEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, GZHAN LA PHAN PA'I PHYIR SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DAM PA SNGA MA'I GSUNG BZHIN BKOD PA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,) @003B ` AOm SVA STI, PHAN BDE'I 'BYUNG GNAS RGYAL BSTAN YONGS 'DU'I LJON, ,RAB RGYAS 'GRO KUN THAR MCHOG 'BRAS BZANG LA, ,SBYOR PHYIR BKRA SHIS LHUN GRUB CHOS GRVA CHER, ,CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED DAL 'GRO'I RGYUN 'DI SPEL, ,SARBA DZA GA TAm, ,
